text: Marcello Siboni (born 6 January 1965) is an Italian former racing cyclist. He rode in five editions of the Tour de France and seven editions of the Giro d'Italia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:People from Cesena Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Emilia-Romagna
title: Marcello Siboni
